title: List of programs broadcast by Adult Swim
data: 2004 animated film written and directed by Masaaki Yuasa . Premiered April 1 , 2018 . Presented in its original Japanese language audio with English subtitles on Toonami as part of an April Fools ' event
2011 animated film directed by Makoto Shinkai . Premiered November 5 , 2016 on Toonami
Dragon Ball Z : Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
1993 animated film based on the Dragon Ball Z anime series . Premiered December 21 , 2014 on Toonami
Fullmetal Alchemist : The Sacred Star of Milos
2011 animated film based on the Fullmetal Alchemist : Brotherhood anime series . Premiered December 14 , 2014 on Toonami
1991 animated film based on the Dragon Ball Z anime series . Premiered May 24 , 2014 on Toonami
2010 animated film set in the same universe as the 1998 Trigun anime series . Premiered December 28 , 2013 on Toonami
Fullmetal Alchemist the Movie : Conqueror of Shamballa
2005 animated film sequel of the original 2003 Fullmetal Alchemist anime series . Premiered December 21 , 2013 on Toonami
2009 animated film by director Mamoru Hosoda . Premiered December 14 , 2013 on Toonami
1988 animated film based on the manga series of the same name . Premiered December 7 , 2013 on Toonami
2009 animated movie remake of the Neon Genesis Evangelion TV series . Sequel to Evangelion 1.11 . Premiered August 31 , 2013 on Toonami
2007 animated movie remake of the Neon Genesis Evangelion TV series . Premiered March 17 , 2013 . The first film broadcast on Toonami since its revival in 2012
2009 live-action movie that inspired the Adult Swim series . Aired on September 2 , 2012
Aired on December 5 , 2009 . First anime film to air on Adult Swim in high definition

First aired on April 1 , 2009 as part of an April Fools ' Day prank . In 2010 it aired again on April Fools ' Day ; featuring Space Ghost interviewing Tommy Wiseau in the same format as Space Ghost Coast to Coast as bumps . The movie aired again on April 1 , 2011 , for the third year in a row . On April 1 , 2012 , part of the opening was aired , before cutting to T.O.M . from Toonami , opening an announced night of the block
Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters

Feature film based on Aqua Teen Hunger Force , and was the first film adaption of an Adult Swim series . It was released in theaters on April 13 , 2007 . The film made its official television debut on March 31 , 2008 on Adult Swim
InuYasha the Movie : Fire on the Mystic Island
InuYasha the Movie : Swords of an Honorable Ruler
intro: This is a list of television programs formerly or currently broadcast on Cartoon Network's late night block, Adult Swim in the United States. Although both networks share the same channel space, Adult Swim is classified as a separate entity for the purposes of Nielsen ratings.
